item.title: HTTP interface for search-alias Views
item.description: Create a search-alias View POST /_db/{database-name}/_api/view Creates a new View with a given name and properties if it does not already exist. Path Parameters database-name* string The name of the database. Query Parameters HTTP Headers Request Body application/json object indexes array of objects A list of inverted indexes to add to the View. collection* string The name of a collection. index* string The name of an inverted index of the collection, or the index ID without the <collection>/ prefix.
